summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Too Faced x Kat Von D ~ Better Together Ultimate Eye Collection ~ Limited Edition
Review Date: 2017/09/05
Store: Too Faced
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Too Faced', 'Special Feature': 'Travel size, Matte', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Coverage': 'Full', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.02 x 9.53 x 7.01 inches; 1.15 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'SG_B01MQZUUTB_US', 'UPC': '651986906291'}
Review Text: I love this set!! A full sized liner, and a Too Faced Better than Sex full sized. The colors are gorgeous. Kats "devotion" is a highly pigmented black!! Great for lining as well...I have the whole collection, and I almost let this by , but the deal was great!!! Recommended!
Review Title: Great Sex!! Great Value!!
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Magic Rainbow Strobing Brush Rainbow Brush
Review Date: 2019/11/13
Store: Too Faced
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Too Faced', 'Color': 'rainbow brush', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Wand', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Ferrule Material': 'Aluminum', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Item Weight': '0.13 Pounds'}
Review Text: This brush is SO soft, and super pretty! The handle is an Irridecent purple with Too Faced written in Holographic print..Super good deal too! Get then before theyre gone!!
Review Title: Super Nice!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Lime Crime 10th Birthday Unicorn Lipstick (Surprise). Long Lasting Cartoon Blue Creamy Matte Lippie (0.12oz / 3.5 g)
Review Date: 2019/11/24
Store: Lime Crime
Average Rating: 3.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Lime Crime', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Item Weight': '0.15 Pounds', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '3 x 0.9 x 0.9 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '816652023638'}
Review Text: Authentic, and super cute! I havent worn it yet, but I have others from this collection! Definitely recommend, if you're looking for a blue lip! Love Lime Crime!!
Review Title: Authentic, and Adorable!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Colourpop x Malibu Barbie Super Shock Highlighter "Beach Party" - Full Size, New in Box
Review Date: 2022/01/18
Store: Colourpop
Product Description: ['Colourpop x Malibu Barbie Super Shock Highlighter "Beach Party" - Full Size, New in Box']
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Coverage': 'Full', 'Brand': 'Colourpop', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '4.92 x 4.45 x 0.63 inches; 0.32 Ounces'}
Review Text: These are HUGE! Had to get this to go with my palette! It's a peachy / gold, and arrived in pretty good shape... the pan, as  as the mirror is HUGE! It's really light weight too,  which is why I took off a star.. it was also slightly cracked on the edge,too, but I am going to use it, so that's fine... Great Formula! Amazing Brand!
Review Title: Adorable!
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Colourpop "I Smell Children" Lux Lipstick Kit! Hocus Pocus Gather Round Sisters! Collection - Lipstick and Lip Liner Duo - New in Box

Average Rating: 4.3

Review Text: Love this set!! So happy to find one!! Beautiful graphics! A must have for fans of the movie, or just for Halloween!!
Review Title: Gorgeous !!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Colourpop ColourPop Eyeshadow Palette (FINE FEATHERED), 0.3 Ounce (Pack of 1)
Review Date: 2022/04/12
Store: Colourpop
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '4.84 x 4.65 x 1.06 inches; 0.3 Ounces'}
Review Text: You cannot beat the price or quality of Colourpop shadows!! This is a beautiful, deep pinks/ purple palette! You cannot find more affordable, consistently good palettes, like Colourpop has. I think you can still get the Super Shock set, that really add a shine to any look! ♡
Review Title: Fine Feathered..
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Colourpop Powerpuff Girls Pressed Shadow Palette - Full Size 12 Pan Eyeshadow Palette New in Box
Review Date: 2022/06/05
Store: Colourpop
Product Description: ['ColourPop Powerpuff Girls 12-Pan Pressed Powder Shadow Palette is a new, limited edition palette that contained a mix of shimmers, pressed glitters, and matte shades. The mattes out-performed the shimmers, but the shimmers should be workable for those who prefer to use an eyeshadow primer and often use fingertips to apply their shimmer eyeshadows.']
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Colourpop', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Travel size, Matte', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '6.85 x 4.65 x 1.06 inches; 7.37 Ounces'}
Review Text: Another hit by colour-pop. I adore this palette. It brings me back to the 90s. And the quality is outstanding.
Review Title: Love!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:  
The user has had a number of positive experiences, particularly enjoying the quality and aesthetic appeal of various cosmetic products. They appreciate the vibrant colors and pigmentation in collections, often highlighting the enjoyable packaging and soft textures, such as the soft brush and the lightweight highlighters. Many purchases reflect their satisfaction with value for money, especially when purchasing limited editions or collaborative collections. Strong recommendations indicate enthusiasm for specific brands and their products, notably emphasizing a nostalgic connection with themed items. Overall, there is a consistent theme of delight in the appearance, usability, and overall performance of the items purchased.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:  
Though the user has expressed generally positive sentiments, a few negative experiences are noteworthy. There were concerns regarding product condition upon arrival, specifically mentioning slight damage, such as cracks in the highlighter pan. Additionally, there was a lower rating for a specific lipstick, indicating a potential mismatch between expectations and actual product performance. Concerns about weight and durability were also noted, affecting the overall satisfaction with certain items. While these issues do not dominate the user’s experience, they indicate a few disappointments that contrast with an otherwise positive shopping behavior.

OVERALL SUMMARY:  
The user displays a primarily positive shopping experience characterized by an appreciation for high-quality cosmetic products, vibrant colors, and appealing designs, coupled with a strong feeling of value in their purchases. However, there are occasional negative aspects, including concerns about product integrity and some lower satisfaction ratings. Overall, the user enjoys their purchases and exhibits a strong loyalty to specific brands, often sharing recommendations despite minor setbacks when it comes to product condition. This balance showcases a dedicated beauty enthusiast with a keen eye for quality and aesthetics.
